item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 09 Aug 2022
item.description:
1. pyml_bindgen: a CLI app to generate Python bindings directly from OCaml value specifications
  2. Interesting OCaml Articles
  3. Logs to a file (a primitive way)
  4. Timedesc 0.8.0 - modern date time handling
  5. OCaml website: Owl book not listed
  6. Application-specific Improvements to the Ecosystem
  7. Other OCaml News
